lenders.name: Monika

I build houses 
, to a standard that is probably different to many parts of the world.

lenders.name: Ewa
lenders.loan_because: These people simply need it

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I believe we have an obligation to care for the less fortunate among us. I see this as a chance to help lift someone up from poverty, to make a direct and real impact on their lives. I have been fortunate in my life - now I can give back in some small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a custodian in a local high school.

lenders.name: Keri
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people to dance.

lenders.occupational_info: stuff of the beehive

lenders.occupational_info: Business owner and stay-at-home Mom.

lenders.name: Alice
lenders.loan_because: I've had my own art business for almost 40  years here in California and always appreciated any help I received from other people. I wanted to do something for someone else who has their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: For my art business, I paint with watercolors and have sold my artwork for 40 years. I have had a part time job for 4 years making signs and art for Trader Joe's.

lenders.name: Russ
lenders.loan_because: I am so fortunate to live in a place with ample opportunity. I believe in sharing some of that good fortune.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses improve their profitability and worker satisfaction.

lenders.name: Beverly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people have a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: Since I retired from teaching after 20 years, my husband and I have our own financial planning company.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.occupation: Consultant to Nonprofit and Public Organizations
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is doing great work and with a relatively small investment I am able to pool with a larger group of people and effect change somewhere on the planet.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a consultant to nonprofit and public organizations specializing in management restructuring, leadership development, strategic planning, evaluation, and new program development. I live in Desert Hot Springs, CA and Joshua Tree, CA.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: This is a good way to be able to help people around the world. It's more personal than supporting a large organization and not really knowing where your money goes.  It's a really cool idea and also fun!

lenders.name: Annette
lenders.loan_because: Through Kiva I can be a part of the empowerment of women in poor communities, promoting gender-equity.

lenders.name: David T

lenders.occupational_info: I try to find work that I enjoy doing, working with people to achieve common goals with a balance of living life.

lenders.name: Jeremy

lenders.name: Scot
lenders.loan_because: Supporting hard working people throughout the world is the best form of diplomacy. Helping others is what Americans are all about.

lenders.name: Mara & Bryan
lenders.loan_because: We want to make the world better by encouraging financial independence and self-sufficiency for others.

lenders.name: ECB-3M Canada
lenders.loan_because: We are a team of people who want to help eliminate poverty.  We like KIVA's concept of using micro-financing to help needy entrepreneurs who wish to learn how to earn their way out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Our team is comprised of many skills, genders, cultures, and ages from a variety of job functions including: Marketing, Sales,  Technical Service, Administration, Management, and Customer Service.  Our people are proud to be able to help others in this way, i.e., through KIVA.  Best wishes...

lenders.loan_because: I can...

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: it's a small world.

lenders.name: Matthew Kevan McGettigan
lenders.loan_because:
It is the right thing to do.

The cold indifference needed to not try and help people in less wealthy parts of the world would be as bad, to my mind, as if I had caused them to be less wealthy in the first place.

It's better than giving to charity because the money is re-paid and then I can give it again. So the benefits keep multiplying.

Also, I help people who want to come and visit the park to do so safely and in a way that will not harm the wildlife.

lenders.occupational_info: I teach Christian values to 3 and 4 yr olds.

What I like most in my profession is the contact with people (each person has a different way of thinking) and the possibility of providing moments of leisure and coexistence with nature, allowing a more relaxed and healthy living.

lenders.name: Lana
lenders.loan_because:
Our mission here at Uniwolf Services, is to provide jobs that are a much-needed scenario in the state of Michigan. We provide a needed service to the auto industry at a relatively cheap rate. 

Our target is to employ up to five unemployed persons, men and women, a year for at “least” the next five years. Our target is also to save the dealerships as much money as possible, especially with the downfall of the auto industry. 

I feel that within the five years, Uniwolf Services will help with the incline in the unemployment rate by employing the unemployed. I feel that if we here at Uniwolf Services keeps revolving our revenue back into our business we will be able to grow beyond our five-year plan. I feel that we will not sell, even if we generate enough money to retire. Reason being, no one can run this and generate the relationship I have with these customer, some being since day one.  After talking to many different people, much of whom are out there to just survive (which is okay) I feel that our success and knowledge is worth sharing to people that need to put food on the table.
lenders.occupational_info: We here at Uniwolf Services provide a quality washing of vehicles on dealership lots at a price everyone can live with. While in fact the car washes that you drive your car to charge a discounted rate, here at Uniwolf cut that down in order for the dealerships to save even more money. I have three men that go out on days that are the right temperature and not raining to wash, rinse and dry every vehicle that a dealership wants maintained. We have a solid schedule that is done every day of every week.

lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel great! I am so fortunate and I want to share my good fortune and love with others.
lenders.occupational_info: It is a joy!

lenders.name: Tobias
lenders.loan_because: I know how much a dream cost , sometimes u need help to make a dream come true sometimes.
lenders.occupational_info:
Founded in 2006, DynamicMixTapes.com is revolutionizing online urban marketing, connecting local, national and international users to all facets of the music industry. DynamicMixTapes.com  sales mixtape DVD and CDs not often available from the larger chains: FYE, Sam Goody, Virgin Records, Circuit city, Wal-Mart this is just to name a few. DynamicMixTapes.com improved the always thriving mixtape industry and filled a niche that both artists and consumers alike were searching for, by marketing for these types of MixTape DVD/CDs, as evidenced by the general demographics (Urban life and the new demand on line for urban music) and the popularity of the latest DJs.  

Twenty five years ago, it was popular among young adults to create mix cassette tapes of their favorite music for personal use and as gifts for friends. Today, with the wide distribution of CD recording equipment, Internet technology, and new recording formats like MP3, DJ now have the ability to create personalized presentations of their favorite music. The market for MixTapes has exploded as a consequence of DJs' ability to create quality MixTapes DVD/CD. With the average price for a new MixTape DVD is $15-$20 and CD at $5-$10, young adults would rather buy from DynamicMixTapes.com for a little over half that price: a MixTape DVD for $10 and CD at $5.

This market has been ignored by the dominant stores with in the internet. They may have a few MixTape DVD/CDs that fit these descriptions, but in general they are far and few between. It is too difficult for the large corporations to market to this specific segment, particularly with their current business model which is putting a stores in all cities that are very similar in feel and library with a concentration on large scale commercial releases.

Through the use of DynamicMixTapes.com competitive advantage attention to customers, DynamicMixTapes.com will grow steadily to profitability. This is manifested in two ways, 1) providing outstanding customer service and knowledgeable help, and 2) supplying MixTapes DVD/CD that have a demand on line but the demand has yet to be addressed by the other players who leave it off their radar, assuming it is only for the fringe of the general population. Fortunately, we have MySpace and other great web sites to help market on line general population.

lenders.occupational_info: We are students at St. Mary's School in Memphis, Tn. We raise money through several fundraisers, including selling bottled water and collecting donations from the rest of the student body.

lenders.occupation: Specialist in workplace safety and health
lenders.loan_because: I think the world is a much smaller place these days than it used to be.  And we should be willing to reach out and help our neighbors.  It's an old-fashioned value.  Only the size of the neighborhood has changed.
lenders.occupational_info: I consult with business owners to help them make their workplace safer for their workers.  I like to see people go home from work in the same condition they were in when they arrived.

lenders.name: Courtney Boys
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a hand getting started!
lenders.occupational_info: I run a big store, we sell over 46,000 different products !

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I want people around the world to have opportunities to make life better for themselves, their families, and their communities.  I think loans are a great way to make new opportunities for people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help teachers and other people who help children to get good health care and to plan for retirement.

lenders.name: Susan C.
lenders.loan_because: I want to share

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I like to help other people and God gave us life and I have a really good life and I would like to spread that with other people that need help.
lenders.occupational_info: Ryan:  I am 13 years old.   I am in school learning from 8:30 am to 3:30 pm.

lenders.name: Alex and Maddie
lenders.loan_because: We give money to people around the world because we want to help them.

lenders.name: Reyvax
lenders.loan_because: We believe in a better world
